channel.title: collectd on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in collectd on Julien Pivotto

item.title: Collectd 5.4.1 RPM's
item.description: In the list of the things I like, there are vagrant, RPM’s and being able to reproduce a build. As I did two years ago with mapnik, I have created a Vagrantfile with a script to build the latest version of collectd. Indeed, the version of collectd available in EPEL is quite outdated. That new version supports some very nice plugins natively, including statsd and graphite plugins. This Vagrantfile uses the spec files that are provided upstream.
